name: FINN.no Job Listing Scraper
description: Extract job listings from FINN.no search results page
navigation_goal: Navigate through the job listings page and extract all visible job postings. Click 'Last inn flere' (Load more) if available to get more results.
data_extraction_goal:
Extract the following information from each job listing card:
1. Job title (exact text)
2. Company name
3. Location (city/region)
4. Job posting URL (full link to job details)
5. Short description/summary if visible
6. Posted date if visible

Return results as a JSON array with objects containing: {title, company, location, url, description, posted_date}

posted_date.description: When the job was posted (e.g. '2 dager siden')

error_code_mapping.NO_JOBS_FOUND: No job listings found on the page
error_code_mapping.LOAD_MORE_FAILED: Failed to load additional job listings
error_code_mapping.EXTRACTION_FAILED: Failed to extract job data from page
